name: VR Robinhood Archery
description:
"VR Robinhood archery" is a VR game of tower defense simulation archery. Players will play the legendary shooter - Robin Hood in the game. Guard the food in the granary and fight against the enemies who come to grab the food.

 Simulate real archery, allowing players to experience the feeling of real shooting in the game.
In the game, players need to simulate the real action of drawing a bow and archery before they can launch arrows. Increase the player's sense of experience in the game.

 Multi-wave attack, continuous output
Monsters will attack the granary in multiple waves. Players need to cooperate with the guards on the house to kill all the monsters that come to grab food, and finally kill the final BOOS - the queen of monsters.

 Beautiful shooters, boost morale
We have prepared 2 beautiful and beautiful archer guards for players to protect the food safety in the granary together with the players.

game operation
Left handle controls bow position
Right handle control controls arrow position
Right trigger to fire bow and arrow
